Text: NOT 720P at all, but rather it's a fairly poor quality 976x416, 737Kbps, 23.976 FPS Standard-Def file.  Audio is 48KHz, 2ch, AC3 (160Kbps) for the Tamil, and AAC for the English.  There are definitely better torrents available for this movie.  I wouldn't recommend this one unless you specifically need the Tamil audio track.
